ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: If there is only one or two tanks in the party I have found it is usaully more efficent to have the shamen/chanter haste.  As it frees me up to
ygData.messageBody:
If there is only one or two tanks in the party I have found it is usaully
more efficent to have the shamen/chanter haste. As it frees me up to
debuff/dot/etc.. If there are 3 or more melee'ers I will always haste :)

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 12:43 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
>
>
> I would always rather do the hasting than the enchanter, BUT I don't
> like telling people what to do with their character. I let
> them know I
> can hast everyone, but if they still want to, I try to find
> other things
> to do.
>
> I only get annoyed with enchanters when they start casting
> DD/DOT's. To
> be honest the mana effiency on those spells are pretty awful
> (maybe I'm
> wrong, I haven't played my enchanter in a LONG time).
> --
> We now return to the non-stop rock.
>
> Matt DeBarger
>
